en.title: Senior Software Engineer ({{iOS}})
en.text: Working on the Agoda iOS app—a globally recognized travel booking platform. Delivering features end-to-end with SwiftUI and SDUI; led architecture refactoring for recommendation/cross-sell module; contributed to App Refresh (UIKit to SwiftUI); migrated session recovery to SwiftData; optimized performance and resolved production issues.

es.title: Ingeniero de Software Senior ({{iOS}})
es.text: Trabajando en la app iOS de Agoda, plataforma global de reservas de viajes. Entrega de funcionalidades con SwiftUI y SDUI; refactorización de arquitectura; migración a SwiftData.

fr.title: Ingénieur logiciel senior ({{iOS}})
fr.text: Travail sur l'app iOS Agoda, plateforme de réservation de voyages. Fonctionnalités avec SwiftUI et SDUI; refactorisation d'architecture; SwiftData.

ko.title: 시니어 소프트웨어 엔지니어 ({{iOS}})
ko.text: Agoda iOS 앱(글로벌 여행 예약 플랫폼) 작업. SwiftUI, SDUI로 기능 제공; 아키텍처 리팩토링; SwiftData 마이그레이션.

en.title: Software Engineer ({{iOS}}, Remote)
en.text: Real-time messaging and customer engagement platform. Architected and implemented features using SwiftUI and Combine; reengineered core app components for responsiveness and load times; collaborated with cross-functional teams on onboarding; enforced coding standards and code reviews.

en.title: Software Engineer ({{iOS}})
en.text: CommChat—secure, end-to-end encrypted messaging app with chat, screen sharing, and backup/restore. Engineered core chat (E2E encryption, backup/restore, screen-sharing); developed low-level networking layer; refined architecture and API specs; mentored junior developers.

es.text: CommChat: app de mensajería cifrada E2E, chat, compartir pantalla, backup/restore. Capa de red, arquitectura, mentoría.

en.title: Software Engineer ({{iOS}})
en.text: Travel booking platform for flights, hotels, and holiday packages. Built and integrated holiday and vehicle booking features; restructured flight and hotel booking systems; partnered with designers on iOS experience; guided new team members and assisted in sprint planning and release management.

en.title: Software Engineer ({{iOS}})
en.text: SmartThings iOS app—smart home automation. Designed modular UI components with UIKit AutoLayout; restructured legacy codebase for testability and increased test coverage by 20%; led knowledge-sharing sessions for Samsung Software Competency Test.
